whoIam: My name is Dimitar Dimitrov. I love challenges and am ready to do anything to achieve my goals. I believe that anyone who has direction and preparation can achieve success. By education, I am an aviation engineer. But over time, I had to change my profession not by my choice. I turned my attention to my hobby, programming, and specifically front-end development. I have various interests, aquaristics, Arduino projects, nature walks, cooking, fishing, programming, reading, investing, personal finance.
goals: My goals are to achieve financial independence and become a quality programmer. I am known for my persistence, I speak directly what I think, and I am ready to help others.
motoOne: Embracing failure is the key to improvement.

onlineShopText: a website or platform that allows users to buy and sell products and services over the internet. It provides merchants with the opportunity to offer their goods or services to the global market without needing a physical presence.
novatioText: Novatio represents a comprehensive ecosystem that provides optimized and automated real-time supply management. This ecosystem consists of separate applications for customers, dispatchers, drivers, and warehouse workers. Novatio is a tool that facilitates intuitive and transparent organization of last-mile processes, improves communication between all participants, and increases end-customer satisfaction.

textForNextProject: Each of these projects started with an idea. What is yours? I would love to turn your next vision into reality and add it to this collection of success stories. With your ideas and my knowledge, we can make something unique together.

finalize: I deeply respect the objectives and dreams of my clients and respond to their further needs at first time. My foremost aim is to cultivate trust and foster lasting connections with my clients, transforming professional partnerships into long-term friendships.
revision: Clear and constructive feedback with detailed and accurate progress updates will be provided based on project milestones, ensuring my clients are well-informed about the status of their goals. This commitment to transparency is a cornerstone of my professional ethics.
designDevelopment: Aligning with my clients' specific requirements, preferences, and coding standards. I am dedicated to delivering results that adhere to the industry's best practices while ensuring top-tier quality and optimal performance.
consultation: Prior to initiating any project, I prioritize an initial online meeting with each client for 15-30 minutes. Ensuring a clear understanding of visions, objectives, methodologies, or other concerns, helps us align our goals and expectations from the very beginning.
myAreasExpertiseDescription: My comprehensive services are custom-tailored to meet your unique business goals and objectives!
